question_text:
Question 13
The Clausius inequality holds good for
(A) any process 
 
 
(B) any cycle
(C) only reversible process 
(D) only reversible cycle
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Clausius inequality
0
Q
S
T
 



Is hold good for any cycle hence the correct option is (B).
Hence, the correct option is (B).
